original_title: The Snowman: The Film That Changed Christmas
overview: Forty years after `The Snowman' was first broadcast, the story of how Raymond Brigg's classic tale was made and became a Christmas institution in over 29 countries, spawning hit singles, a cameo from David Bowie, and a host of snowy spin offs.
tagline: This Christmas Channel 4 airs ‘THE SNOWMAN™: The Film That Changed Christmas’
title: The Snowman: The Film That Changed Christmas
